TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructorBuilder extends System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class ConstructorBuilder Inherits ConstructorInfo Implements _ConstructorBuilder
public ref class ConstructorBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::ConstructorInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorBuilder

summary.span: 定义并表示动态类的构造函数。

span.span: Defines and represents a constructor of a dynamic class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于完全描述 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 中的构造函数包括名称、 属性、 签名和构造函数主体。 is used to fully describe a constructor in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and constructor body. 结合使用类在运行时创建类。It is used in conjunction with the class to create classes at run time. 调用要获取其实例的。Call to get an instance of . 如果为动态类型未定义构造函数，自动提供默认构造函数，它会调用基类的默认构造函数。If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class. 如果你使用定义为动态类型的构造函数，默认构造函数未提供。If you use to define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided. 必须提供默认构造函数除了你定义的构造函数的以下选项：You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined: - 如果你希望只需调用基类的默认构造函数的默认构造函数，则可以使用方法来创建一个 （也可以将访问限制到它）。If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it). 不提供此默认构造函数的实现。Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor. 如果这样做，当你尝试使用构造函数时，将引发异常。If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor. 不引发异常时调用方法。No exception is thrown when the method is called. - 如果你希望默认构造函数来执行多个只需调用基类的默认构造函数或调用另一个构造函数的基类，或执行其他操作完全，必须使用方法来创建，并提供您自己的实现。If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the method to create a , and provide your own implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的上下文用法`ConstructorBuilder`。The following code sample illustrates the contextual usage of a `ConstructorBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public void AddDeclarativeSecurity (System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action, System.Security.PermissionSet pset);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddDeclarativeSecurity(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action, class System.Security.PermissionSet pset) cil managed
Public Sub AddDeclarativeSecurity (action As SecurityAction, pset As PermissionSet)
public: void AddDeclarativeSecurity(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction action, System::Security::PermissionSet ^ pset);

param.name: action
param.span: 要执行的安全操作，例如 Demand、Assert 等。

span.span: The security action to be taken, such as Demand, Assert, and so on.

param.name: pset
param.span: 应用此操作的权限集。

span.span: The set of permissions the action applies to.

summary.span: 将声明性安全添加到此构造函数。

span.span: Adds declarative security to this constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用多次，每次调用指定的安全操作 (如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一组应用此操作的权限。 can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 版本 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，通过使用此方法应用于构造函数的声明性安全属性存储在旧的 XML 元数据格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a constructor by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format. 请参阅发出的声明性安全属性。See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`。The following code sample illustrates the use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity`. [!code-cpp[ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4/CPP/constructorbuilder_attributes_4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4/CS/constructorbuilder_attributes_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ConstructorBuilder_Attributes_4/VB/constructorbuilder_attributes_4.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inherit`参数将被忽略，因为类永远不会继承自基类的构造函数。The `inherit` parameter is ignored because a class never inherits constructors from base classes. 若要获取的自定义特性，完成类型的生成通过调用，检索构造函数通过调用方法返回的类型，然后调用方法返回的。To get the custom attributes, finish building the type by calling , retrieve the constructor by calling the method on the returned type, and then call the method on the returned .

span.span: (For example, this is necessary to convert a that represents 1000 to a value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.)

summary.span: 调用由给定对象上的此实例动态反映的构造函数，传递指定的参数，并受给定绑定器的约束。

span.span: Invokes the constructor dynamically reflected by this instance on the given object, passing along the specified parameters, and under the constraints of the given binder.

returns.span: 返回 ，它是已调用的构造函数的返回值。

span.span: Returns an that is the return value of the invoked constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果构造函数具有任何参数的值`parameters`参数应为`null`。If the constructor has no parameters, the value of the `parameters` parameter should be `null`. 否则为数量、 类型和中的元素顺序`parameters`数组应的数量、 类型和此实例反射的构造函数参数的顺序相同。Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 例如，如果此实例反射的构造函数被声明为公共类采用两个字符串，则`parameters`参数应是数组的长度为 2。For example, if the constructor reflected by this instance is declared as public class taking two strings, then the `parameters` parameter should be an array of with length 2. > [!NOTE] > 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和使用反射，只要完全受信任代码调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数量、 类型和参数数组中的元素的顺序应等于数量、 类型和此实例反射的构造函数的参数顺序。The number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 在调用构造函数中之前,`Invoke`可确保调用方具有访问权限，以及参数是否正确数目、 顺序和类型。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission, and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和使用反射，只要完全受信任代码调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
